When I try to start the game, it comes up with a black screen and won't load. I have given it over 10 minutes to try to load up, but nothing happened. I had to manually turn my computer off and back on to get it to work again. Can anyone help?
Yes, I do realize this is in Alpha, so I don't expect the game to work perfectly for everyone.

This game is still really broke, but even then it's quite fun.
I keenly await the 1.0.

For those of you who gets black screen follow these steps.

1. Right click on "prison architect"
2. Properties
3. Compatibility
4. Mark Privilege Level "Run this program as an administrator"

This solution solved the problem for me.
